title: Former UK Health Secretary Gets a TV Gig, Then a Suspension
description: Matt Hancock, who was filmed in a steamy embrace with an aide, breaking strict Covid distancing rules, will appear on “I’m a Celebrity … Get Me Out of Here!”
dc:creator: Stephen Castle
category: Im a Celebrity ... Get Me Out of Here! (TV Program)
media:description: Matt Hancock last month in London. His decision to appear on a reality TV show has prompted anger and mockery.
